name.japanese: インペルダウン LEVEL 4 焦熱地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun Reberu Fō Shōnetsu Jigoku

description: The fourth level of Impel Down, characterized by extreme heat and a pool of boiling blood. This is where the battle between Luffy and Magellan takes place.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Magellan Battle
keyEvents.description: The final confrontation between Luffy and Magellan occurs on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of Luffy's most devastating defeats.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Defeat on Level 4
keyEvents.description: Luffy is completely defeated and poisoned on Level 4 before being taken to Level 5.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of Luffy's failed attempt to break through to Ace.

statusHistory.reason: Level 4 remains operational during this episode

name.japanese: インペルダウン LEVEL 5 極寒地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun Reberu Faibu Gokkan Jigoku

description: The fifth level of Impel Down, characterized by extreme cold temperatures. Prisoners here are subjected to freezing conditions. This is where Luffy's poisoned body is taken after his defeat.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Taken to Level 5
keyEvents.description: The guards transport Luffy's unconscious, poisoned body to Level 5 - Freezing Hell.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Luffy's location for his eventual rescue by Bentham and treatment by Ivankov.

statusHistory.reason: Level 5 is shown as Luffy is brought here

name.japanese: インペルダウン LEVEL 6 無限地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun Reberu Shikkusu Mugen Jigoku

description: The sixth and deepest level of Impel Down where the most dangerous criminals are kept. This is where Portgas D. Ace is imprisoned.

keyEvents.title: Ace Hears Luffy
keyEvents.description: Ace raises his head in his cell as he hears Luffy's agonized cries from above.
keyEvents.significance: Emphasizes the bond between the brothers and Ace's helpless situation.

statusHistory.reason: Level 6 remains operational with Ace imprisoned
